titles.title: Bison Nickel Restoration Act of 2004
A bill to recognize conservation efforts to restore the American bison from extinction by placing the image of the American bison on the nickel, and for other purposes.
Bison Nickel Restoration Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Bison Nickel Restoration Act of 2004 - Amends the American 5-Cent Coin Design Continuity Act of 2003 concerning the redesigning of the nickel.
